about_the_game:
THREEDAYS is a military tactical shooter that reveals the harsh realities of modern warfare through stories of courage, sacrifice, and the strength of Ukrainian soldiers. The game combines intense gameplay with deep emotional immersion, allowing players to relive the most pivotal moments of the full-scale war in Ukraine.

Real Stories

At the heart of the game are true heroes—brave defenders of Ukraine. Using photogrammetry technology, we accurately recreate the appearances of active servicemen and veterans. You will experience how tough decisions and boundless courage of ordinary soldiers can change the course of war.

Authentic Locations

Explore places that have become symbols of resistance: from the ruins of Azovstal to the devastated streets of Bakhmut. Each location is based on real maps, photos, video references, and eyewitness accounts. Feel the atmosphere of every city, village, and trench as you step into the center of the battle.

Intense Tactical Gameplay

Shooting accurately is not enough. Play smart: analyze the situation, develop strategies, and plan your actions. The enemy adapts and learns from mistakes, making battles increasingly challenging. And never forget the soldier’s code of conduct.

Emotional Narrative

Feel the weight of war through tense, thought-provoking scenes that highlight the true cost of freedom. Experience moments when heroes push the limits of their physical and moral endurance.

Cooperative Mode

Team up with your comrades to complete missions together. Combine efforts to tackle complex tasks where seamless teamwork is key to success.

Unique Characters

Each fighter has their own story, motivation, and skill set. Choose characters that suit your strategy and combine their abilities to achieve your goals. From battle-hardened commanders to ordinary soldiers with extraordinary capabilities, each character adds depth to the gameplay.

*The game is in development. Some features may change, and new content will be added. We appreciate your support!

Who is THREEDAYS for?

For players who value tactical shooters with a focus on realism and historical accuracy.
For those seeking a profound emotional experience based on real events and human stories.
For everyone who wants to witness modern warfare through the eyes of its heroes and understand the true price of freedom.

THREEDAYS is more than just a game. It’s the story of a bloody struggle that continues to this day.

#FREEAZOV
